name: Androcks: Erase Virtualization
description:
Androcks: EV 2021, the first video game production from Concofail Studio.

Androcks: Erase Virtualization puts the destiny of both mankind and androids in your hands, taking you to a near and not-so-impossible future where machines have become more intelligent than humans.
Every choice you make affects the outcome of the game so every time you play you might make a new story.

Main characters are Ava, Simon and Daniel.

Enjoy The Game.

RATING rated as a 17+ game

Content is generally suitable for ages 18 and up. The game Contains violence and strong language.

SPECIFICATIONS

-OS: Windows 7-8-8.1-10  (32-64 bit)
-Processor: your one will be nice
-Memory: 2GB RAM
-Video:  Not needed
-Video RAM: 0GB
-Hard Drive : 460MB
